item.title: The past and the future of video games
item.author: pmassicotte@hotmail.com (Philippe Massicotte)
item.description: This week was my first participation to the Makeover Monday data visualization challenge. The theme was PCs to Become the Smallest Gaming Platform in 2018. The dataset consists in gaming revenues divided by platform: mobile, PC and console games. Setup library(tidyverse) library(ggpmthemes) library(ggchicklet) theme_set(theme_exo(base_size = 14)) theme_update( rect = element_rect(fill = "#173f50"), text = element_text(colour = "white"), axis.text = element_text(colour = "white"), axis.ticks = element_line(colour = "white") ) Download the data The nice thing is that data.
